_all.Name: All Bells
_all.Description: A "virtual" bell that controls the rest of the bells. DO NOT DELETE

Change.Subject: All Bells Toggled
Change.Body: All bells have been changed to <%= item.Enabled %>. They were changed at <%= Date %>

test.Name: Test Bell - EVERY MINUTE
test.Description: RUN FOR ALL OF THE MINUTES!
